subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Of all the statistics that can be used to analyze Robinson Cano’s first month as a Seattle Mariner, perhaps the most revealing one is that he has played in all 24 of the team’s games.
snippet: Of all the statistics that can be used to analyze Robinson Cano’s first month as a Seattle Mariner, perhaps the most revealing one is that he has played in all 24 of the team’s games.
